desc: A list of 7 OSS projects and the reasons behind these projects.  This article is to fit longer text into a caption in github.

desc: A convenience group indexing early articles on testing. Intro and linking articles for TDD, BDD, test tables, boundary, regression, mutation and unit test notes.

desc: Yes, the DB is essential, and its also frail. Keep it running... I focus in this article on: DB stability, DB performance, DB scalability and complicated queries
title: Testing DB coupled structures

desc: A UI and UX test library to be run in the browser, to assist usability and branding tests.  Can be linked into Jasmine, Mocha, or Jest.

desc: This article gives a definition of JS behaviour testing, provides metrics used for comparing test frameworks and finally outlines pros and cons of 7 behaviour test tools for JS
title: JS behaviour testing

title: phpunit-skelgen

desc: Case notes for my Perl unit test framework.

desc: Article with information about current stress test tools, from 2018 onward.   I examine the requirements for the tools and provide an exhaustive list of those tools.

title: Route tester for Symfony

desc: Research on Storybook: another frontend test tool that supports UX, UI, and component testing. Article describes 9 user cases and a list of 4 limitations

desc: A review of another JS test framework, called Vitest.  This outlines a list of useful features and a few issues to know about.
title: Vitest
